Class OceanStats

java.lang.Object
  OceanStats

public class OceanStats
extends java.lang.Object

This class collects and provides some statistical data on the state of a ocean. It is flexible: it will create and maintain a counter for any class of object that is found within the ocean.

Version:
2006.9.20
Author:
David J. Barnes and Michael Kolling, Richard Jones
